description.en: Ask the student to enter a year (e.g. 1925).
description.nl: Vraag de leerling om een jaartal in te vullen (bijv. 1925).

generation.instructions: The settings should include a 'dateType' field, which can be either 'year' or 'full-date', and a 'correctAnswer' field, which should be a year (e.g. 1925) if 'dateType' is 'year', or a full date (e.g. 1925-12-31) if 'dateType' is 'full-date'. Ensure the `correctAnswer` setting exists (REQUIRED!) and matches the specified dateType.

settings.description: The type of date to expect (e.g. year only, full date).
The correct answer to the question, which can be a year (e.g. 1925) or a full date (e.g. 1925-12-31), based on the dateType setting.

correct-answer-placeholder.en: Enter the correct year or date (e.g. 1925 or 1925-12-31)
correct-answer-placeholder.nl: Vul het juiste jaar of de juiste datum in (bijv. 1925 of 1925-12-31)
